snippet.title: Mechanines Tower Defense - Cinematic Trailer
snippet.description:
This is a new Tower Defense Roguelite! Whishlist on Steam at:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3095890/Mechanines_Tower_Defense/

In a apocalipt World,
the machines turned against Humanity
and our last hope...
are the Evodogs.

- A Roguelite Tower Defense Experience
- Create your Own Strategy
- Random Map Generation system

Credits:
Edited by Pedro Luís Kecek Abrão
Music by Edu Carvalho
